name: Holokitten
description:
Fight your way through the alien-infested beach using your trusty holographic kitten launcher.

Hopefully the game should be pretty self-explanatory, it's basically your standard action plattformer.

There's no music in the game (because of a lack of both time and skill) but feel free to put on some sweet chiptunes in the background (like this for instance: https://inversephase.bandcamp.com/album/chiplust),
